titles.title: Continuing Appropriations resolution FY2006 (Third)
Making further continuing appropriations for the fiscal year 2006, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Appropriations.
Mr. Lewis (CA) moved to suspend the rules and pass the resolution, as amended.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H.J. Res. 75.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the resolution, as amended Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

vote.text: Received in the Senate, read twice, considered, read the third time, and passed without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary: 12/18/2005--Public Law. Amends Public Law 109-77 to extend until December 31, 2006, specified continuing appropriations for FY2006. Declares that, notwithstanding such date, funds shall be available and obligations for mandatory payments due on or about November 1, 2005, December 1, 2005, and January 1, 2006.
